name: Shakir
description: A ferocious Warrior who can dominate the battlefield, especially in his Wolf Mode.

ultimate.name: Wolf Form
ultimate.description: Shakir morphs into a wolf and smashes a tile, knocking up the enemy there, and dealing 190% damage to enemies within 2 tiles, during which he is Unaffected. Shakir consumes 60 Energy per second to maintain his wolf shape. Shakir generates a Lupine Aura in a range of 2-tile while in the wolf shape, dealing damage to all enemies within the frontal radius of the arc with normal attacks. Allies within the range of Lupine Aura reduce 20% taken damage and increase 10 Haste.

upgrades.upgrade: Reduces the allies' damage taken within Lupine Aura by 20% and increases their Haste by 15.
Reduces the allies' damage taken within Lupine Aura by 25% and increases their Haste by 15.
Reduces the allies' damage taken within Lupine Aura by 25% and increases their Haste by 20.
Reduces the allies' damage taken within Lupine Aura by 25% and increases their Haste by 25.

skill_1.name: Agonizing Rush
skill_1.description: Shakira launches 3 consecutive strikes at an enemy, dealing 90% damage with the first 2 attacks and 160% damage with the 3rd attack. While in Wolf Form, this skill damages enemies within a frontal 1-tile arc.

upgrades.upgrade: The 3rd attack deals 180% damage.
The 3rd attack deals 200% damage.
The 3rd attack deals 220% damage.

skill_2.name: Wolf's Will
skill_2.description: Pasive. Shakir increases 25 Ranged DEF. In Wolf Form he is Unaffected and gains 30 Life Drain. Each non-summoned ally within Lupine Aura grants him 5% ATK.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases pasive Life Drain to 40.
Increases pasive Ranged DEF bonus to 30.
The bonus ATK from each non-summoned ally within Lupine Aura is increased to 7.5%.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Shakir reduces his damage taken by 9% during battle. His damage taken is further reduced by 4% if at least 2 non-summoned allies are buffed by his Lupine Aura.

upgrades.upgrade: Shakir reduces his damage taken by 12% during battle. His damage taken is further reduced by 5% if at least 2 non-summoned allies are buffed by his Lupine Aura.
Shakir reduces his damage taken by 15% during battle. His damage taken is further reduced by 7% if at least 2 non-summoned allies are buffed by his Lupine Aura.

ex_skill.name: All-Conquering
ex_skill.description: Shakir can cast his Ultimate once his Energy exceeds 800. Shakir stays in Wolf Form and consumes no Energy within 5s each time after casting the Ultimate.

upgrades.upgrade: Shakir stays in Wolf Form and consumes no Energy within 7s each time after casting his Ultimate.
Each non-summoned ally within Lupine Aura can share the same bonus ATK from Wolf's Will.
Shakir can cast Ultimate upon reaching over 700 Energy.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Shakir reduces the target's Vitality by 60 within 4s using the 3rd hit of Agonizing Rush.

season_skill.name: Battle Zeal
season_skill.description: Gains a shield that absorbs 8% damage for 6s when dealing Ultimate damage to an enemy.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the shield value to 9%.
Increases the shield value to 10%.
Increases the shield value to 11%.
Increases the shield value to 12%.
Increases the shield value to 13%.
Increases the shield value to 14%.
Increases the shield value to 15%.
